docs.snippet: University of Connecticut Professor Bradley Wright has all types of questions for his research: Did you pray in the last 24 hours? To what extent are you feeling nurtured or angry with God? Do you feel a sense of purpose right now?...
docs.lead_paragraph: University of Connecticut Professor Bradley Wright has all types of questions for his research: Did you pray in the last 24 hours? To what extent are you feeling nurtured or angry with God? Do you feel a sense of purpose right now?

headline.main: UConn Prof Delves Into Spirituality in Daily Life
headline.print_headline: UConn Prof Delves Into Spirituality in Daily Life

docs.snippet: Every year since 2000, the CBC program “Hockey Night in Canada” has chosen a city or town to serve as the setting for a celebration of hockey’s place in Canadian communities....
docs.lead_paragraph: Every year since 2000, the CBC program “Hockey Night in Canada” has chosen a city or town to serve as the setting for a celebration of hockey’s place in Canadian communities.
docs.abstract: CBC program Hockey Night in Canada, since 2000, has chosen a city or town to serve as the setting for a celebration of hockey’s place in Canadian communities; Lloydminster, the 2014 selection, has featured performances by songwriter and former hockey star Bryan Trottier.

headline.main: In Small Town in Canada, Celebrating Hockey With Songs
headline.print_headline: In Small Town, a Sound and a Pastime Unite Canada
